question: In the smallest dataset that the given paper applies, how is the mutual information calculated?
answer_format: Your answer should be a string, the formula of mutual information in LaTeX format.
reasoning_steps: Find the datasets that the paper applies.
Read the corresponding paper to find the formula of mutual information.

eval_kwargs.formulas: \mathbb{I}[k, w] =- \sum_{k=0}^{N} \langle \text{Bin}(k | f^w(x), N) \rangle \log [\langle \text{Bin}(k | f^w(x), N) \rangle]+ \sum_{k=0}^{N} \langle \text{Bin}(k | f^w(x), N) \log [\text{Bin}(k | f^w(x), N)] \rangle
eval_kwargs.question: How is the mutual information calculated?
